settings.review_message: " I just LOVE the Neck cream, I've really noticed a difference in the firmness of my neck. My husband has even asked what I am doing differently. Will definitely purchase again."

settings.title: Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream Benefits
settings.title_1:
Tightens Neck Sag & <br class="hide-mob">
Droopy Jowls
settings.content_1: Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream restores the skin with water-binding molecules for complete rehydration, working to firm up sagging skin on the neck & jowls for the appearance of a more lifted, sculpted jawline. Glycosaminoglycans support & protect collagen & elastin production to combat future signs of aging.
settings.title_2: Visibly Smooths Fine Lines <br class="hide-mob">and Wrinkles
settings.content_2: Using high-quality glycolic acid, our formula exfoliates old, dry skin and stimulates new collagen production to make way for a new layer of fresh skin. This results in a smoother, glowing neck and decolletage immediately, & a visible reduction in appearance of fine lines and wrinkles with continued use.
settings.title_3: Reduces the Appearance of <br class="hide-mob">Dry, Crepey Skin
settings.content_3: Dry, crepey skin on the neck and decolletage happens when our skin’s sebum, or natural oils, decline with age. Our exclusive formula puts the natural sebum back into the skin with plant-based squalane, an effective natural ingredient proven to diminish dry skin & visibly repair the skin’s vital barrier
settings.title_4:
Reduces the Appearance
<br class="hide-mob">of Sun Damage
settings.content_4: The effects of sun & other free radicals on the skin contribute to dark spots, wrinkles, lines & general dullness. Powerful antioxidant activity helps protect & reduce the appearance of sun damage on the neck and chest, resulting in a more even skin tone and a smooth and glowing texture.

settings.tab_info:
Glycolic Acid

There is ONE ingredient that’s been proven time and time again to exfoliate dry, dead skin cells and stimulate collagen production in the skin … and it’s called glycolic acid.

Glycolic acid helps to dissolve the “glue” that holds dead skin cells together, allowing them to shed more rapidly. This makes way for fresh, new skin cells to form for a more dewy, smooth and plump texture.

But that’s just one piece of the glycolic acid puzzle. Because it’s also known to stimulate the skin to create new collagen production, which we all know is one of the most essential components for tight and firm skin.

Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream contains the highest-quality glycolic acid to help achieve a tighter, smoother and younger-looking neck.

  • Best exfoliating ingredient for maturing skin
  • Exposes fresh, new skin cells
  • Stimulates new collagen production

Squalene

The natural component in our sebum that keeps the skin from becoming overly dry is called squalene, which of course like everything else, tends to decline as we get older.

However, there is an ingredient form of squalene that manually gives skin that natural component it needs. Unfortunately, most products that contain this ingredient source it from none other than SHARK LIVER. This is a prime example of a product that is NOT cruelty-free and should be avoided at all costs.

Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream uses an effective plant-based alternative to squalene called squalane (with an A). This 100% cruelty-free, fragrance-free, non-GMO and all-natural ingredient penetrates the skin at a cellular level, defeating dryness and giving skin back its dewy, plump and wrinkle-free texture.

  • Boosts skin’s hydration
  • Penetrates skin at a cellular level
  • 100% cruelty-free, fragrance-free, non-GMO and all-natural

Glycosaminoglycans

Glycosaminoglycans” (CAGs) maintain, support AND promote collagen and elastin production, as well as bind water back into the skin. They are extremely important in the health of our largest organ, yet they also decline rapidly with age.

Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream contains natural CAGs to put this water-binding molecule back into the skin. CAGs play an important role in the “bounce-back” in the skin, and works magically with glycolic acid and squalane to address all components of neck aging.

Without this important step in a skincare regime, skin will look dry, sagging and defeated, no matter what else is done to try to help.

  • Maintains, supports and promotes collagen and elastin production
  • Penetrates skin at a cellular level
  • Works with other ingredients to address the 3 causes of neck aging

Natural Support Ingredients

For superior results, Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream’s formula contains a powerful combination of natural support ingredients to solidify results and get the healthiest, most gorgeous skin possible...

  • Shea Butter

    A rich, cream-colored substance that has natural soothing and moisturizing properties, significantly increasing skin hydration and giving the skin a more dewy, natural feel.

  • Willow Bark Extract

    Has been used for centuries to naturally soothe irritated skin, detoxify the pores, and rejuvenate the skin. This powerful ingredient derived from the bark of the willow tree contains salicin -- which prompts cell turnover and exfoliates the skin to reduce dry and dull skin.

  • Glycerin

    A super-hydrating ingredient that acts as a humectant, a substance that allows the skin to retain its moisture and also helps firm, tighten, and accelerate skin softness.

  • Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract

    A powerful green tea extract that helps protect against free radical damage, UV rays and collagen degradation, while also reducing the appearance of sun-damage on the skin.

  • Vitamin E

    A potent antioxidant, among the best for protecting against free radicals and sun damage. It’s also known to assist in various kinds of cellular restoration and healing.

settings.title: Full Ingredient List
settings.ingredient_list_content: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Phenyl Trimethicone Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Canola Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Sorbitan Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Silica, Glycosaminoglycans, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Cellulose Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Cholesterol, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA.

settings.title: FAQs
settings.html:
At What Age Should I Start Using The Neck Cream?

Just like taking care of your face, it’s never too early to start taking care of the skin on your neck - especially considering it is more fragile and susceptible to premature aging. Most women only think to start using a neck cream after they begin to see signs of sagging, lines and wrinkles. We suggest starting any time. Even women in their 70s and 80s who had never used a neck cream before are seeing positive results in the appearance of their neck using Fièra Luxury Neck Cream.

Where Are Fiera Products Made?

Our products are all proudly formulated and produced in the USA. Depending on if you order our concealer or some of our other facial care products, they were manufactured in either New York or Florida.

What Is Your Return Policy?

We have a 30-day full money back return policy. Simply mail the products to either address:

1) USA: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 3335, Buffalo, NY, 14240-3335
2) Canada: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 1212 Willowdale, ON, M3J 0L3

When returning any products please ensure to include your full name, and order number on the outside of the package. Your order number can be found on the packing slip or on the order confirmation email we sent to you. Please ensure the information provided is the same credentials that were used when placing your order. This allows us to associate the returned product with the appropriate account.

As soon as we receive the return, we will process the refund right away. All refunds will go back to the original form of payment. Once the refund is processed, some banks can take up to 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect on your credit card statement.

Customers are responsible for the cost of return shipping.

Can I Purchase Fièra Products In Retail Stores?

We made the decision to not put our products in retail outlets and instead sell only to our customers directly online. Retail stores take very large margins and charge a premium for the top shelf space. Consumers get promoted products that paid the most money to be there versus being promoted the products that deliver the best results. We let our customer reviews do our selling for us and instead of buying shelf space, we take a portion of every sale donate it to help feed people in need through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest.

Where do your products ship from?

We ship to our US customers daily from Buffalo, NY and to our Canadian customers daily from Toronto, ON.

When is my order arriving?

All of our customer shipments are fully tracked. On the next business day following your purchase, you should have received an email from us containing your tracking information. If you don’t see this in your inbox, make sure to check your spam folder.

What concealer shade should I order?

The color you choose depends on what you'll be primarily using it for. If it's especially for under eye coverage, we recommend going a shade lighter than you'd normally choose. If it's for other full facial coverage, we recommend choosing a shade closer to what you would use for foundation. We have customers who will buy two shades so they can go lighter and darker as they need to and use the two colors to blend.
Here’s a video that should help you choose the perfectly color for you.

How do you apply the concealer?

How you apply the concealer comes down to personal preference. The concealer itself is quite thick in order to provide maximum coverage so it’s best to let it warm up a little before spreading either on the back of your hand or between your fingers.

Once warmed, most of our customers chose to use their fingers to dab it onto their skin, and then use the brush, their fingers, or a sponge to blend it.

What are the ingredients in your products:

Concealer Ingredients
Neck Cream Ingredients
Finishing Powder Ingredients
Apple Stem Cell Cream Ingredients
Citrus Stem C Serum Ingredients

What is the undertone of each concealer shade?

Light - fair cool
Neutral beige - neutral
Medium - warm
Deep - warm
Dark - cool

How long does a tube of concealer last?

It depends on the individual, as some of our customers will use it primarily as a concealer, while others use it as foundation. Our product is formulated to be quite concentrated and therefore a little goes a long way!

Do you give samples?

Unfortunately, due to the high cost of shipping and packing, we do not have samples but we do however offer a full 30 day money back guarantee. If for whatever reason you aren't satisfied you can return any of our products for a full refund

Will your products clog my pores and make me break out?

Our products are noncomedogenic and have high quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid which is light, hydrates skin and doesn't clog pores, making it much less likely that you'll breakout.

What if I order the wrong shade of concealer?

If you are unsatisfied for any reason you can return your concealer for a full refund. Please refer to our Return Policy.

Does your concealer conceal scars, brown spots, age spots, under eye bags, sun damage etc…?

Our concealer is specifically formulated for mature skin to provide excellent coverage for various signs of aging and skin imperfections.

How long does it take to ship?

In the US we use USPS First Class Mail and in Canada we use Canada Post for all our orders. We ship our orders next business day and barring any carrier delays most orders arrive within 2-4 business days.

Do you test on animals?

Absolutely not! None of our products are ever tested on animals.

Does the concealer work for rosacea?

We’ve had a lot of positive feedback from customers using our concealer who have rosacea.

How long does the concealer last?

Our concealer has been specifically formulated for all day wear.

Will the concealer work for sensitive, oily and dry skin types?

Our concealer has been formulated to work with all skin types

How do I change or cancel my subscription?

Should you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so by emailing support@fieracosmetics.com or by calling customer service at 1-833-693-4372. We will be happy to assist you with whatever you need. You can reach us Monday to Friday between the hours of 8 am - 8pm, or Saturday from 9 am - 5pm, Eastern Standard Time.

How and when will I be charged for my subscription?

The credit card you used for your first subscription order will be automatically charged at the time of shipping, and at the time of shipping for every future order, depending on your selected subscription. You will never be charged shipping for any subscription orders. The charge will appear on your billing statement as Fièra Cosmetics.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.

settings.points: Fièra has partnered with two wonderful organizations - Second Harvest and Food Rescue US - to help fight hunger in both the U.S. and Canada.
Every purchase of Fièra Neck Cream equals one nutritious meal donated to a hungry person in need.
To date, Fièra has been able to donate over 1.1 million meals & counting thanks to these partnerships & their ever-growing customer base.
